SEARCH
Package com.alticelabs.ccp.exagon.api.workflow

Interface IExagonWorkFlow

public interface IExagonWorkFlow
A specification of an Exagon workflow that contains the logic of a Saga flow.

This is indispensable for an Exagon orchestrator that intends to orchestrate a Saga.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<CommandContext>
    getFirstCommands()
    Returns the first business commands (one or more) to start one Saga flow.
    List<CommandContext>
    getNextCommands(Object businessStatus, String stepIdentifier)
    Returns the next business commands (one or more) depending on the step identifier and status from the previous command.

  • Method Details

    • getNextCommands

      List<CommandContext> getNextCommands(Object businessStatus, String stepIdentifier) throws BusinessException
      Returns the next business commands (one or more) depending on the step identifier and status from the previous command.
      Parameters:
      businessStatus - the object containing the step identifier and status from the previous command
      stepIdentifier - the step identifier from the previous
      Returns:
      a list with the next business commands
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if something unexpected occurs while determining the next flow step

    • getFirstCommands

      List<CommandContext> getFirstCommands()
      Returns the first business commands (one or more) to start one Saga flow.
      Returns:
      the list with the first business commands
